description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the CVE-2024-3596 spoofing vulnerability related to the RADIUS protocol:

1. Apply the KB5040431, KB5040442, or KB5040448 updates pertinent to your Windows version.
2. Ensure that your system is restarted after installation to apply changes.
3. Verify that your system is on the correct build before proceeding with the installation.

**Details**:
These updates address the message integrity enforcement during transmission, protecting against forgery attacks. The proper update should be selected based on your specific Windows version and architecture.
For manual installation, download the updates from the official Windows Update catalog:
- [Download KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
- [Download KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
- [Download KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
- [Download KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a supported Windows version as listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
